attributes.action: Sit down and look at the ACTUAL evidence that climate change is natural and NOT man made
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The climate is getting warmer we all know this because the Government tells us.
Put it simply...It's a bit far fetched... 
Volcano's produce more carbon dioxide than all human objects put together and always will. The sun and clouds control our climate not the small amount of gasses we produce.
Tony Blair and the rest of the Government should stop using climate change as a licence to print money and actually look at the facts before ripping us off AGAIN & AGAIN.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
